title.rendered: 12 Best Things to Do in Downtown Los Angeles

content.rendered:
From sky rise buildings to diverse cultures and art, Downtown Los Angeles has something for everyone. Here, you will fall in love with the full downtown living experience. This city has it all— daytime attractions, nightlife activities, premier shopping locations and high end restaurants. There are some many places to go in Downtown Los Angeles, and this article will help kickstart your adventures. Here are the 12 best things to do in Downtown Los Angeles.

FOLLOW ALL COVID PRECAUTIONS

Related: Find Rooms For Rent in Downtown Los Angeles

Get the full outdoors experience

1. Grand Park

Grand Park is one of the most famous places in Downtown LA. It’s the perfect spot to exercise, host picnics, relax between lunch breaks, and enjoy the city’s majestic views.

Website

2. Grand Central Market

This place is a downtown landmark that brings a variety of cuisines and cultures from different food vendors to locals and tourists. Events and game nights are also hosted here, making it the perfect spot for meeting up with friends old and new! It’s one of the best places to go in Downtown LA, and allows you to fully experience the area’s diversity.

Website
Order Online

3. Los Angeles Zoo and Botanical Gardens

Another great historical landmark, the Los Angeles Zoo is home to over 1400 animals representing 270 different species. As if that wasn’t enough, you can also explore a beautiful botanical collection of over 800 plant species.

Website
Buy Tickets

Sports in Downtown Los Angeles

1. Dodger Stadium

This baseball park is the home field for the Los Angeles Dodgers, and is a must-visit for major baseball fans. You can watch your favorite games and cheer on your favorite athletes right here.

Website
Tickets

2. Staples Center

One of the best places to go in Downtown LA, this center hosts major, high-profile sporting events of both national and international distinction.

Website
Tickets

3. Banc of California Stadium

Catch all the latest events here – from music concerts to sporting events. Imagine watching soccer games while enjoying views of Downtown LA’s skyline.

Website

Cultural Attractions in Downtown Los Angeles

1. Walt Disney Concert Hall

Experience the best in classic, contemporary, world and jazz music in this sophisticated concert hall. Its creativity and unique embodiment of the arts makes it one of the best places to go in Downtown LA.

Website
Tickets

2. El Pueblo de Los Angéles

Also called Olvera Street, this place is a major gathering spot, event venue and cultural hub in Downtown LA. Enjoy free tours, good food, and see historical monuments on display.

Website

3. Los Angeles City Hall

You’ve probably seen the Los Angeles City Hall in your favorite movie or sitcom. It gives wonderful views of the city and is free to access. The beautiful staircase in the hall is also a dream location for weddings and other important occasions.

Website

Restaurants and Bars in Downtown Los Angeles

1. Joey’s Restaurant

This space consists of a theater kitchen, a wine wall, and a dining room that features a popular art piece. This Canadian-based restaurant is one of the best places to eat in Downtown LA.

Website

2. The Broken Shaker

In a beautiful city like Los Angeles, rooftop bars are great for wining and dining. The Broken Shaker offers customers an eclectic menu of handcrafted cocktails and small bites.

Website

3. The Wolves

The name of this bar is truly ironic, as its customer service has been widely praised by visitors. This bar bears an antique decoration and offers a menu that serves cocktails and American fare.

Website

Do you know what else Roomi does outside of helping its readers find the best things to do in Downtown LA? With our ever-increasing lists of rooms and roommates across the world, we help you find your perfect match!

DOWNLOAD THE APP NOW!
